body_text:
Daunting diff here, but if you pull down locally it should all be pretty easy to read through.
There are still some static elements in here (search/filtering/etc.) but basic CRUD should all be in-tact.
The font loading and SASS compilation is incredibly slow, but I started another branch to replace pipeline with webpack which should speed things up. I'll have a PR for that later this week.
@rehandalal r?

title: Control Admin UI
body:
Daunting diff here, but if you pull down locally it should all be pretty easy to read through.

There are still some static elements in here (search/filtering/etc.) but basic CRUD should all be in-tact.

The font loading and SASS compilation is incredibly slow, but I started another branch to replace pipeline with webpack which should speed things up. I'll have a PR for that later this week.

@rehandalal r?
